titles: The deplorable state of the kingdom of Ireland, and the just apprehensions of a new massacre from the papists there, have forced many thousands of families to fly over into England,
author: Lamplugh, Thomas, 1615-1691.
notes: Title from first line of text.
Signed: Tho. Ebor [i.e. Thomas Lamplugh] ... [and 4 others].
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
